awards:
第77届戛纳电影节(2024)
　　影评人周单元  短片发现奖(提名) 杰姆·德米雷尔
　　影评人周单元  Canal+电视台短片奖 杰姆·德米雷尔

　　第49届香港国际电影节(2025)
　　国际短片竞赛 火鸟大奖(提名) 杰姆·德米雷尔

writer.name: 杰姆·德米雷尔 Cem Demirer

director.name: 杰姆·德米雷尔 Cem Demirer

introduction: Mert, a 30-year-old male, is employed at an abandoned-looking amusement park. He is grappling with an internal duality, while sensing a lurking identity bent on undermining him. Throughout the film, Mert interacts with various people and creatures, struggling to understand what's going wrong with his mental health. Despite his persistent pursuit of answers, Mert confronts a daunting struggle to delve into the depths of his psyche, hindered by a hesitancy to fully confront the mysteries within.
